        public WKTWriter(boolean useInnerParensForMultiPoints)
        Create a WKTWriter
        Parameters:
        useInnerParensForMultiPoints - The flag to determine is we should use inner parens for MultiPoint WKT.

      • write

        public String write(Geometry g,
                    boolean includeSrid,
                    boolean includeDimension)
        Write a Geometry to a WKT String
        Parameters:
        g - The Geometry
        includeSrid - Whether to include the SRID prefix (SRID=4326;) or not
        includeDimension - Whether to include the dimension (M, Z, or ZM) before the Geometry type
        Returns:
        A WKT String
